data.text: I stayed at this place recently on a biz trip to RDU. I like the proximity to the airport, cleanliness, staff and room comfort. I think there is scope to improve the breakfast menu and options. All in all, pretty good deal!
data.title: Pretty good for biz trip

data.text:
After spending all day in the Philadelphia airport after many cancelled flights we finally got a late flight to Raleigh. Upon arrival we called many hotels and this was the only one who still had a shuttle working,   it was 11pm and we had a child with us.  The driver said 10-15 minutes but it was more like 4 minutes!  She was so nice and friendly and even checked us in when we arrived.
The room was very clean and super comfy beds, so welcome after 8 hrs in an airport!
The next day the driver was kind enough to bring us to Hertz to rent a car. All in all a great stay.

OwnerResponse.author: jack l, General Manager de Courtyard Raleigh-Durham Airport, a répondu à cet avis
OwnerResponse.title: Réponse du propriétaire
OwnerResponse.text:
Dear Julieccr, 
Thank you for staying with us and submitting a positive review about our “clean and convenient” hotel. We are glad that our complimentary airport shuttle was available for you and your family after your long day of travel. We take great pride in our service and are happy to hear about our friendly shuttle driver, as well as our clean and comfortable beds. Thanks again and please make sure to visit us again when you are in the RDU area. 
Sincerely, 
Jack Lucido, 
General Manager

data.text: you pay for that if you try to work in your room in the afternoon, or if you try to sleep in, in the morning.  Right under the take-off paths, so it was noisy at 6am.  Otherwise, it is a typical Courtyard that caters to travelers/business types.  The staff was very friendly, rooms are clean.

OwnerResponse.author: jack l, General Manager de Courtyard Raleigh-Durham Airport, a répondu à cet avis
OwnerResponse.title: Réponse du propriétaire
OwnerResponse.text:
Dear Dave5260,
Thank you for staying at the Courtyard RDU and for taking the time to review our hotel. We are definitely convenient to the airport, but we regret that the airport noise was a problem during your stay. We rarely receive complaints about airport noise unless the airport changes the flight path due to wind currents. Nevertheless, we are very sorry that the airport noise prevented you from sleeping-in and working from your room. Should this occur in the future, we would be happy to change your room location so you can rest. Additionally, please feel free to work in our lobby / Bistro area since our complimentary wireless internet is available throughout the entire hotel. Thank you for your comments about the staff and rooms. We are delighted that you found the staff to be friendly and the rooms to be clean. We value your business and hope to see you again.
Sincerely,
Jack Lucido, General Manager

data.title: Convenient to the Airport, but....
